import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; const ModalViewEmployee = ({ isOpen, onClose }) => { const handleClose = () => { onClose(); }; // Date // const date = new Date(); const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false); const [data, setData] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { if (isOpen) { setIsLoading(true); fetch("http://localhost:3001/employee/${id}") .then((response) => response.json()) .then((json) => setData(json)) .finally(() => setIsLoading(false)); } }, [isOpen]); if (!isOpen) { return null; } return ( <> {isOpen && (
